document.full_text: novartis ag  is likely to be the latest drugmaker to show it too has been hit by a collapse in sales of pandemic flu medicines when it posts its first-quarter results on tuesday.
document.title: novartis q1 seen hit by absence of flu drug sales
lines_and_colors: novartis ag  is likely to be the latest drugmaker to show it too has been hit by a collapse in sales of pandemic flu medicines when it posts its first-quarter results on tuesday.
